reviewText: Hopefully more of these videos surface for gift-giving, but this pioneering sequel to nation-changing runaway bestseller "Color Me Beautiful" is available in original hardback & not-as-good-color paperback so good that BeautiControl Cosmetics stole it by changing the terms for the 4 basic styles & the formulas to achieve them in the 4 human color palettes "Spring, Summer, Autumn, & Winter" we unusually have all 4 in our family these discoveries have helped us so much, especially since our fair European coloring is dominated by strong colors/styles. ~ Enjoy :)
